hero.headline: DaVinci Resolve vs HitFilm
hero.subheadline: Two powerful free editors. Different strengths for different creators.

sections.content: DaVinci Resolve and HitFilm are the most capable free video editors available. Resolve excels at color grading and professional workflows. HitFilm shines with VFX and compositing. Both can produce professional YouTube contentâ€”here's how they compare.

faq.question: Which free version is more capable?
faq.answer: DaVinci Resolve free has fewer limitations. Most features available free. HitFilm locks more behind paywall but still very capable.

faq.question: Can my computer run DaVinci Resolve?
faq.answer: Check GPU requirements carefully. Resolve is demanding. 16GB RAM minimum, dedicated GPU recommended. HitFilm runs on more modest systems.

faq.question: Which is better for YouTube?
faq.answer: Both work excellently. Resolve for polished, color-graded content. HitFilm for effects-heavy videos. Most YouTubers would be happy with either.

faq.question: Is the learning curve worth it?
faq.answer: For Resolve, yes if you're serious. Professional skills transfer to paid work. HitFilm easier to start but still capable.
